CONFIRMATION:
Are you sure you want to restore the server invitations? All members will retrieve the invitations they had before the last time the command `{{prefix}}remove-invite` was typed (or 0 if the command was never typed).

:information_source: **Invitations overview**:
It will be restored, in total: **{{regular}}** regulars, **{{bonus}}** bonus, **{{leaves}}** leaves, **{{fake}}** fake.

{{success}} Type `-confirm` to confirm.
{{error}} Type `cancel` to abort.
CONFIRMATION_MEMBER:
Are you sure you want to restore the invitations of **{{username}}**? They will retrieve the invitations they had before the last time the command `{{prefix}}remove-invites` was typed (or 0 if the command was never typed).

:information_source: **Invitations overview**:
It will be restored: **{{regular}}** regulars, **{{bonus}}** bonus, **{{leaves}}** leaves, **{{fake}}** fake.

{{success}} Type `-confirm` to confirm.
{{error}} Type `cancel` to abort.
TITLE: ☄️ Invitations restored
